Sentencas: Yttria stabilized zirconia and lanthanum strontium manganate (YSZ/LSM) have been employed to fabricate the composite cathode layer for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: In the present study, the YSZ/ LSM composite coating was deposited by atmospheric plasma spray (APS) using the mechanical blending LSM and YSZ with ratios of 50:50, 40:60, and 20:80 wt.%.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the composite coating was measured by the means of direct current (DC) measurement in the temperature range of 500-900 degrees C.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the YSZ-50%LSM coating ranged from 2.17 to 3.60 S/ cm along the direction parallel to the coating surface at the temperature range.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: For the same specimen, the electrical conductivity perpendicular to the plane is less than one-tenth of that in the plane.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: The anisotropy of the electrical conductivity is attributed to the phases of different properties in the composite coating and the APS coating structure characteristics.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials

Sentencas: The results also showed that the electrical conduction of the composite was strongly influenced by the YSZ content.
Titulo: Microstructure and electrical conductivity of atmospheric plasma-sprayed LSM/YSZ composite cathode materials
